Fonctions membres publiques

Fonctions membres publiques hérités de ContainerInterface
get (string $id)
has (string $id)
Description détaillée
A ServiceProviderInterface exposes the identifiers and the types of services provided by a container.
Auteur
Nicolas Grekas p@tchwork.com
Mateusz Sip mateusz.sip@gmail.com
Documentation des fonctions membres
getProvidedServices() getProvidedServicesServiceProviderInterface ServiceProviderInterfacegetProvidedServices
getProvidedServices ( )
Returns an associative array of service types keyed by the identifiers provided by the current container.
Examples:
['logger' => 'Psr\Log\LoggerInterface'] means the object provides a service named "logger" that implements Psr\Log\LoggerInterface
['foo' => '?'] means the container provides service name "foo" of unspecified type
['bar' => '?Bar\Baz'] means the container provides a service "bar" of type Bar\Baz|null
Renvoie
string[] The provided service types, keyed by service names
La documentation de cette interface a été générée à partir du fichier suivant : public/glpi/vendor/symfony/service-contracts/ServiceProviderInterface.php
